title: Can you Check if my brothers ticket is still open
body: He has been waiting for a password reset now for 80 hours. His In Game Player name is PolyesterPenguin. Can anyone at riot please check to at least let me know so i can tell my brother they are still trying to get to him or does he have to resend  it because it got deleted?

replies.body: I looked into this and see that there's actually a few tickets open here.  Having so many at once can cause some delay or confusion in responding, so it's likely all but one will be closed for consistency.  The ticket will be escalated to our account team who will look into this!  It's important your brother doesn't reply to the ticket until he receives a response, otherwise it can drop his ticket to the bottom of the queue.  In the meantime, he can also try using our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) to help with his recovery or prepare for any questions he may be asked.  We will respond to the ticket as soon as possible!

thank you. I told him to stop a few days ago so he hasn't sent another request I told him to be patient. We just wanted to make sure one was still open. Thank you. THe account recovery thing for some reason wasn't working which is weird because he said he forgot it in past(bad patterns) and it worked that time.
